hero.subtitle: Our Story

story.title: Our Story
story.description: We are a company specialized in car protection using the latest nano and ceramic technologies.

history.title: Our History in the Egyptian Market

2012.title: Nano Technology Revolution
2012.description: The founder realized that the Egyptian market needed advanced technologies to protect cars from harsh weather conditions. He began importing the first nano ceramic products from America, and this was the beginning of a revolution in car protection in Egypt.

2015.title: Regional Expansion
2015.description: The company expanded to include branches in Alexandria and Ismailia, and became a leader in ceramic coating for cars. It overcame economic challenges through focusing on quality and distinguished service.

2018.title: Strategic Partnership
2018.description: Royal Nano Ceramic achieved a great milestone when it became the exclusive partner of "Nano Tech" American company in Egypt and North Africa. This cooperation allowed access to the latest global technologies.

2020.title: Research and Development Center
2020.description: The year 2020 witnessed a major shift in the company's strategy, where it began developing local products using joint Egyptian and American expertise. A research and development center was established in 6th of October City.

2024.title: National Leadership
2024.description: Today, Royal Nano Ceramic owns a network of 16 branches spread throughout Egypt. The company has become a reference in car protection, serving more than 250,000 customers annually.
